message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, especially considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm looking to save as much as I can, and I believe this product is worth more to you than to me.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While I value your interest, $12,000 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $13,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to go up to $12,500. Can you consider that?
